title: Why do I get queues if I DC'd from game due to bad internet
body: This has happened to me heaps. I don't leave the game, I simply drop out because of my internet connection, then I get queues for it. I was wondering why Riot can't change it so that a DC due to a high ping would be wavered from punishment.

replies.body: Try not to play ranked if you know you have bad internet or know you will dc

In these cases, players could just buffer their internet speeds or just disconnect their internet if they need to leave mid-game and dodge the punishment. If you'd like to resolve your connection issues, I'd love to work with you to do so!
